sentence.orig: Beautiful safari experience!

review.sentence: beautiful safari experience

sentence.orig: A stunning weekend getaway at Phinda Mountain Lodge.

review.sentence: stunning weekend getaway phinda mountain lodge

sentence.nounPhrases: ['late afternoon', 'friday', 'game drive', 'beautiful nyala buck', 'spectacular view', 'main lodge area']
sentence.orig: We arrived late afternoon on Friday, unfortunately we missed the game drive, but were welcomed firstly by the beautiful Nyala buck that live in the trees surrounding the lodge and then by the staff with friendly smiles and warm welcomes, drinks were offered and a spectacular view of the reserve and a tour of the main lodge area.

review.sentence: arrive late afternoon friday unfortunately miss game drive welcome firstly beautiful nyala buck live tree surround lodge staff friendly smile warm welcome drink offer spectacular view reserve tour main lodge area

sentence.orig: The lodge has a beautiful open African Zen feel about it and the view point is amazing.

review.sentence: lodge beautiful open african zen feel view point amazing

sentence.orig: We were then ushered to our lodging and oh what wonderful rooms they were.

review.sentence: usher lodging oh wonderful room

sentence.orig: Set in the heart of the lodge overlooking the trees our bathroom was all windows with no curtains, the view from the bath was spectacular, the large sliding doors lead out on to the deck with a private, secluded rim flow pool and two very comfy lounges.

review.sentence: set heart lodge overlook tree bathroom window curtain view bath spectacular large sliding door lead deck private seclude rim flow pool two comfy lounge

sentence.orig: The King size bed was stunning, particularly after a wonderful but tiring day of game drives.

review.sentence: king size bed stunning particularly wonderful tire day game drive

sentence.orig: At dinner we met our Ranger Janus, a large, hearty, robust gentleman with a wonderful knowledge of the bush.

review.sentence: dinner meet ranger janus large hearty robust gentleman wonderful knowledge bush

sentence.orig: Saturday morning was early rising and off on our game drive.

review.sentence: saturday morning early rising game drive

sentence.orig: We saw Hyena twice, albeit from a distance, a mother cheetah and her three cubs or pre-adults tucking in to an impala kill.

review.sentence: saw hyena twice albeit distance mother cheetah three cub pre-adults tuck impala kill

sentence.orig: We couldn't have been twenty feet away and it was an amazing experience to see these beautiful lithe creatures in the flesh in their natural habitat.

review.sentence: could n't twenty foot away amazing experience see beautiful lithe creature flesh natural habitat

sentence.orig: We then chased down two female lions, but they were fairly far from us and we could not approach them and get closer as they were lying on burnt land and the vehicles could not drive on the burnt escarpment due to new shoots growing.

sentence.orig: The evening drive was even more spectacular, we found two female lions and a young male lion sitting quietly in some dappled shade in the most tranquil dam with flamingos, hippo, crocodile, pelicans and other bird life.

sentence.orig: The male lion became restless and decided to move and he circled the back of our cruiser and stood right next to the cruiser, walked on and plopped himself down in a more shady spot.

sentence.orig: It follows the general game reserve structure of early morning game drive, followed by breakfast, then lunch, then an evening game drive, and finally dinner in the boma.Wildlife:Because Phinda is such a diverse park, there are grasslands where you can see cheetah, rhino, and other animals easily, as well as rocky hills, a wetland area, and also a forested region.

sentence.orig: Nothing is too much trouble for the brilliant staff a large number being native to the area, the Zulu's love of life is infectious and our ranger Dumi brought a whole new meaning to the word "safari".

review.sentence: nothing much trouble brilliant staff large number native area zulu 's love life infectious ranger dumi bring whole new meaning word safari

sentence.orig: He and his brilliant spotter left no stone unturned in pursuit of the big five, sometimes taking us on hair raising escapades across the very bumpy terrain, stamping on the floor of the jeep to wake a sleeping lion (not recommended), he seemed to get closer to, take more chances and be more tenacious than most of the others!!!!

sentence.nounPhrases: ['big five,little five', 'evening safari', 'what fantastic creature', 'beautiful cat']
sentence.orig: He pointed out big five,little five and anything else that moved but the pinnacle of his skill,together with that of his eagle eyed spotter, was when we were coming back in from the evening safari and the torch picked out two eyes in the gloom, leopard, what a fantastic creature, we watched in awe as this beautiful cat walked along the ridge and than crossed over in front of us dumbstruck by it's magnificence.

sentence.orig: The food at the lodge was normally served outside in the boma in the evening and was delicious, the cooks were very proud to come to the table and explain their individual specialities , we tried most things including warthog and kudu, which I must say was very tasty but I did feel somewhat guilty about having been thoroughly amused by the warthog's antics during the day.

sentence.orig: Dumi then played a trump card, a jeep was in trouble and needed our help, did we mind if we went over to them before going back, he then proceeded to drive us to the "jeep" which turned out to be a barbeque in the forest ablaze with fairy lights, candles and fires and all the other guests who had also been "conned" into helping the jeep in distress, a truly magical evening.

sentence.nounPhrases: ['phinda', 'phinda', 'regular basis', 'early 90s.our last visit', '1996!this year', '23rd wedding anniversary,my husband', 'mountain lodge.he', 'friday night', 'popular game lodge', 'be.the attention', 'chalets,the private plunge pools!wow', 'such special occasion.our daughters', 'new destinations,have', 'phinda', 'lodge', 'visit again.the ranger', 'fantastic.the game', 'cheetah cub', 'previous night.crocodiles,new lion cubs', 'recent warthog', 'watchful eye', 'mother,the list', 'adrenalin pumping!our early morning wake', 'themselves,then nature', 'chain reaction.the next thing', 'knowledgable ranger', 'habits.the food', 'delicious.the staff attentive', 'hospitable.our rate', 'room bar .well', 'amarula', 'guests different experiences.well', 'phinda,you', 'phinda']
sentence.orig: Phinda just got better.We had been going to Phinda on a regular basis in the early 90s.Our last visit was in 1996!This year to celebrate our 23rd wedding anniversary,my husband surprised us with a 1 night stay at Mountain Lodge.He was disappointed that he was unable to get the Friday night as well!Just confirms how popular this game lodge is in KZN.We were treated as 5 star guests should be.The attention to detail ,the beautifully thought out chalets,the private plunge pools!Wow this was definitely the place to be on such a special occasion.Our daughters who are well travelled & normally prefer new destinations,have placed Phinda on a Lodge to visit again.The ranger and tracker were fantastic.The game viewing exhilarating.We witnessed 2 buffaloes fight over a calf.Really heartbreaking.In their chase they disturbed a cheetah cub which had been separated from its mother the previous night.Crocodiles,new lion cubs feeding off a recent warthog kill under the watchful eye of their mother,the list is endless...Really gets the adrenalin pumping!our early morning wake up was rewarded with a herd of elephants.We tracked them down and then followed them for a while.There was a very young one which rhe older elephants tried to hide from us.They had a cooling down session by tossing sand over themselves,then nature called and that created a chain reaction.The next thing they heard a chopper in the air and within seconds they had disappeared into the thickets.Throughout this our knowledgable ranger & tracker in whispers gave us info on ellies and their habits.The food was delicious.The staff attentive and hospitable.Our rate included the in room bar .Well we were too well fed and rehydrated to even have the Amarula from the bar!& Beyond certainly take care of their guest.We will certainly be returning soon.Perhaps to try out one of the other lodges as the different lodges afford guests different experiences.Well done to Phinda,You make us proud.PS we live in a town just an hour away from Phinda.

review.sentence: phinda get better.we go phinda regular basis early 90s.our last visit 1996 year celebrate 23rd wedding anniversary husband surprise u 1 night stay mountain lodge.he disappoint unable get friday night well confirm popular game lodge kzn.we treat 5 star guest be.the attention detail beautifully think chalet private plunge pool wow definitely place special occasion.our daughter well travel & normally prefer new destination place phinda lodge visit again.the ranger tracker fantastic.the game view exhilarating.we witness 2 buffalo fight calf.really heartbreaking.in chase disturb cheetah cub separate mother previous night.crocodiles new lion cub feed recent warthog kill watchful eye mother list endless really get adrenalin pumping early morning wake reward herd elephants.we track follow while.there young one rhe older elephant try hide us.they cool session toss sand nature call create chain reaction.the next thing hear chopper air within second disappear thickets.throughout knowledgable ranger & tracker whisper give u info ellies habits.the food delicious.the staff attentive hospitable.our rate include room bar .well well fed rehydrated even amarula bar & beyond certainly take care guest.we certainly return soon.perhaps try one lodge different lodge afford guest different experiences.well do phinda make u proud.ps live town hour away phinda

sentence.nounPhrases: ['phinda', 'experience top-notch safari', 'nyala', 'cheetah up-close.daily safari quality', 'guide', 'nic // tracker', 'malusi):(1', 'feel', 'private reserve']
sentence.orig: We would heartily recommend Phinda to anyone wishing to experience a top-notch safari, particularly to anyone interested in seeing Nyala or Cheetah up-close.Daily Safari Quality (Guide: Nic // Tracker: Malusi):(1) Overall Feel: being at a private reserve, vehicles are allowed to go off-road, which we did numerous times.

review.sentence: would heartily recommend phinda anyone wish experience top-notch safari particularly anyone interested see nyala cheetah up-close.daily safari quality guide nic // tracker malusi 1 overall feel private reserve vehicle allow go off-road numerous time

sentence.orig: Consequently, you can get much closer to the animals, on a more consistent basis, than you can at the various national parks in South Africa and other countries.

review.sentence: consequently get much closer animal consistent basis various national park south africa country

sentence.orig: On one occasion at Phinda, we had Hyenas sniffing our vehicle.

review.sentence: one occasion phinda hyena sniff vehicle

sentence.orig: As we were there in winter, the lack of foliage on the undergrowth helped with the viewing.

review.sentence: winter lack foliage undergrowth help viewing

sentence.orig: However, the undergrowth is dense in many areas and viewing is still much more difficult than in the Serengeti or Chobe.

review.sentence: however undergrowth dense many area viewing still much difficult serengeti chobe

sentence.orig: For sheer quantity of game, Phinda is probably not the place to go.

review.sentence: sheer quantity game phinda probably place go

sentence.orig: The only game we saw that was numerous was Nyala, which roam the camp freely.

review.sentence: game saw numerous nyala roam camp freely

sentence.orig: However, we saw a lot of Cheetah at Phinda, including many young (too cute!

review.sentence: however saw lot cheetah phinda include many young cute

sentence.orig: ), whereas we traveled for a month in 2006 without seeing any Cheetah.

review.sentence: whereas travel month 2006 without see cheetah

sentence.orig: Another star of Phinda was black rhino; on a special black rhino walk we got to within 30m of black We saw very few elephants, no leopard, a smattering of lion, and a few more buffalo.

review.sentence: another star phinda black rhino special black rhino walk get within 30m black saw elephant leopard smattering lion buffalo

sentence.orig: We also saw a fair amount of hyena and a scattering of hippos, kudu, wildebeest, waterbuck, and other antelopes.

review.sentence: also saw fair amount hyena scattering hippo kudu wildebeest waterbuck antelope

sentence.orig: Birds were also not as numerous as I would have liked, being an avid birder.

review.sentence: bird also numerous would like avid birder

sentence.orig: Game viewing is in a open vehicle with 3 rows of seats for up to 3 persons per row.

review.sentence: game viewing open vehicle 3 row seat 3 person per row

sentence.orig: Another row of seats in the front for the driver and guide, with a "Tracker" seat mounted to the left-hood where the tracker normally sits.

review.sentence: another row seat front driver guide tracker seat mount left-hood tracker normally sit

sentence.orig: Temps were low to mild during most of the game drive times.

review.sentence: temp low mild game drive time

sentence.orig: Layering was very important in order to be warm enough when cold but cool enough as the temps got greater.

review.sentence: layer important order warm enough cold cool enough temp get greater

review.sentence: one nice touch morning drive hot water bottle include blanket include every drive

sentence.orig: (2) Communication: 7-8.

review.sentence: 2 communication 7-8

review.sentence: malusi talkative drive personable time

sentence.orig: I thought that Nic could have done a better job of discussing options when other rangers reported sightings that might be of interest; too many time we wound up diverting from our original plans and driving long distances to see something and not actually seeing anything.

review.sentence: think nic could do better job discuss option ranger report sighting might interest many time wind divert original plan drive long distance see something actually see anything

sentence.orig: We also had a couple of instances where group events were previously arranged but not communicated properly (for example, we were set to have dinner with Nic and the others riding in our vehicle but didn't know about it until 10-15 minutes after we were supposed to be at dinner).

review.sentence: also couple instance group event previously arrange communicate properly example set dinner nic others rid vehicle n't know 10-15 minute suppose dinner

sentence.orig: (3) Knowledge: 7-8.

review.sentence: 3 knowledge 7-8

review.sentence: overall would like see bit discussion behavior trait animal see specifically behave phinda v location

sentence.orig: When Nic did talk about these things, he did a better than average job.

review.sentence: nic talk thing better average job

review.sentence: 4 professionalism 8

sentence.orig: We also were able to view elephant (fulfilling the Big Five) as well as see Black Rhino and even had the most incredible experience of seeing a Black and White Rhino together in the same frame, breathtaking!I truly could go on and on for ever on how fantastic Phinda is but in the essence of saving you time I'll end now so you can book your own Phinda experience, you'll never regret it!

sentence.orig: The location is spectacular, the rooms unbelievably luxurious and the staff, food and drink exceptionally good.

sentence.orig: Both who are fantastic at their job if you have a choice!We were also lucky enough to see all the big 5 and more and the last night was very special with them taking our group to the very top of the biggest hill on Phinda where we were able to have final drinks on our last evening safari.

sentence.orig: Wonderful Bush Experience.Together with another couple my wife and I visited Phinda Mountain Lodge in the Phinda Private Reserve in KZN for 3 nights in mid-Aug.The booking process went smoothly however we had to move rooms after the first night which the staff made easy and painless.The room itself was fantastic (#23 is worth requesting - larger deck and great view from the plunge pool).The staff were all extremely helpful and friendly whilst our ranger was exceptional, especially as we requested him to find specific birds only found in this area.They arranged 3 different suppers with the last one being a surprise in the bush and they really went to a lot of trouble for all the guests.

review.sentence: wonderful bush experience.together another couple wife visit phinda mountain lodge phinda private reserve kzn 3 night mid-aug.the booking process go smoothly however move room first night staff make easy painless.the room fantastic 23 worth request larger deck great view plunge pool .the staff extremely helpful friendly whilst ranger exceptional especially request find specific bird find area.they arrange 3 different supper last one surprise bush really go lot trouble guest

sentence.orig: Generally the food was good but has room for improvement.We also went on the boat cruise which, whilst short, is worthwhile and at no extra cost.This lodge is part of the &Beyond Group who we really recommend for busg experiences as the cost is all inclusive of EVERYTHING.

review.sentence: generally food good room improvement.we also go boat cruise whilst short worthwhile extra cost.this lodge part & beyond group really recommend busg experience cost inclusive everything

sentence.orig: A wonderful stay.This stay was booked directly through & Beyond who were excellent in every respect.Upon our arrival we were greeted from the car by staff bearing hot towels and drinks which were much appreciated,This is a large lodge and we were fortunate to be put in the palatial room 8 which has the view featured in the brochure, it was, until another & Beyond Loge I visited later the most luxurious room I have ever stayed in.Mountain Loge is Phinda's family Lodge but there were fortunately no children when we were there in early Sept, I would suggest checking term times etc.

sentence.nounPhrases: ['5 star price', '3 star service.this', 'third visit', 'phinda', 'note of;every activity', 'coordinate.the rhino', 'free laundry service', 'arrival orientation briefing', 'short notice', 'wild cat cheetah programme']
sentence.orig: 5 star price, 3 star service.This was my third visit to Phinda and was saddened by several issues that readers should take note of;Every activity we tried to arrange was either fully booked or too difficult to coordinate.The rhino tracking programme – as advertised on their brochure and one of the reasons why we chose this camp – had no rangers with the correct permits to accommodate.Offered a free laundry service on our arrival orientation briefing – only to find out management could not accommodate at short notice.“Wild Cat Cheetah Programme” fully booked, but when we contacted the company direct, they were more than accommodating to make space.

sentence.orig: This was our 4th &beyond camp on our recent trip to SA, following on from Kirkman's, Ngala Safari Lodge and Ngala Tented Camp.We took a charter flight from Ngala to Phinda so we had time for the morning game drive at Ngala, a leisurely lunch and 3 hour relax at Phinda before the afternoon game drive.

sentence.orig: There are limited number of lodges that take kids (ours was then 2.5 years old), especially on game drives, but Mountain Lodge was fine - we had to work around the rules, but had a great solution - on one of the drives, we had a babysitter at the lodge (which is surrounded by beautiful nature and animals roaming freely), and the next two, we had a private car, which meant that we could do everything at a more leisurely pace.

sentence.orig: The main lodge was spectacular; the spacious suites nestled on the grounds around the lodge had every necessary amenity with minibar, snacks and laundry included along with our own personal soaking pool; food that was absolutely fantastic in its quality and presentation, especially the dinners offered in outdoor BBQ setting under the stars or if you like in a picnic setting out in the park; the guides and trackers were first rate and extremely knowledgeable which made the actual safari experience something we'll never forget - being so up close with cheetahs, lions, elephants, zebra, rhino, hippo, impala, leopards, buffalo, giraffe, wart hogs, monkeys, baboons, crocodile, etc, just too much to believe!!!

review.sentence: kid 9 11 love every second trip well cater lodge

sentence.orig: They particularly loved the surprise pancakes cooked for us in the bush.

review.sentence: particularly love surprise pancakes cook u bush

sentence.orig: No TV at all at the lodge but that works with all the activities through the day and they had kindles for down time.

review.sentence: tv lodge work activity day kindles time

sentence.orig: Everything at Phinda was sensitively put together in harmony with its surroundings.

review.sentence: everything phinda sensitively put together harmony surroundings

sentence.orig: Really highly recommended.

review.sentence: really highly recommend

sentence.orig: Beyond impressed by Phinda....

review.sentence: beyond impress phinda

sentence.orig: I have just returned to the UK from my SA adventure and by far Phina and all it had to offer was the best experience of my months travelling...(luxury travelling) We were very lucky to have 4 nights in Mountain Lodge which gave us 8 Game Drives, each drive was just as exciting as the last and enabled us time to see the Big 5 and more!

review.sentence: return uk sa adventure far phina offer best experience month travel luxury travel lucky 4 night mountain lodge give u 8 game drive drive exciting last enable u time see big 5

sentence.orig: Lucky our ranger was not only so knowledgeable but good fun.

review.sentence: lucky ranger knowledgeable good fun

sentence.orig: The lodge accommodation was very comfortable and extremely private and was a great space to relax in after our early morning drives.

review.sentence: lodge accommodation comfortable extremely private great space relax early morning drive

sentence.orig: For me the added extras that Phina go to is what made our 4 nights so special....The morning Champagne Breakfast which had been beautifully set up for our surprise arrival was a wonderful treat.

review.sentence: added extra phina go make 4 night special .the morning champagne breakfast beautifully set surprise arrival wonderful treat

sentence.orig: Each meal at Mountain Lodge was outstanding, we enjoyed private meals just the 2 of us and also dining at a hosted table with our Ranger.

review.sentence: meal mountain lodge outstanding enjoy private meal 2 u also din hosted table ranger

sentence.orig: Massive thank you to everyone who contributed to our stay at Mountain Lodge we look forward to seeing you when we return next year!

review.sentence: massive thank everyone contribute stay mountain lodge look forward see return next year

sentence.orig: Phinda Safari.We were two couples who stayed at Phinda for 3 days at the end of August.

review.sentence: phinda safari.we two couple stay phinda 3 day end august

sentence.orig: We then spent 3 days on safari at Exeter and another 3 days at Jabulani before heading to Cape Town for 3 days and then back to the states.

review.sentence: spend 3 day safari exeter another 3 day jabulani head cape town 3 day back state

sentence.orig: We all felt Phinda was a fantastic experience with a very attentive staff and really nice private lodges for each couple.

review.sentence: felt phinda fantastic experience attentive staff really nice private lodge couple

sentence.orig: Our best ranger and tracker of the three stays was Ian and KB at Phinda.

review.sentence: best ranger tracker three stay ian kb phinda

sentence.orig: Ian was knowledgeable about all the animals but especially the birds, their names and habits.

review.sentence: ian knowledgeable animal especially bird name habit

sentence.orig: His enthusiasm about everything we saw was unusual in any guide.

review.sentence: enthusiasm everything saw unusual guide

sentence.orig: His broad smile and fist pump in the air when we finally found a black rhino and drove close to it was a highlight.

review.sentence: broad smile fist pump air finally find black rhino drive close highlight

review.sentence: always first vehicle morning last one back dark

sentence.orig: This place was incredible!

review.sentence: place incredible

sentence.orig: Had a fantastic stay made all the more special by the effort put in by Luke and Bethenel (excuse the spelling) before the last game drive we were asked by them what we wanted to see of course one of the dominant males was the answer so off we set next morning treked for a couple of hours and there he was walking nearly within touching distance AMAZING is an understatement .Thanks to all for this experience highly reccomended

review.sentence: magical christmas.we arrive christmas eve four night -me sister 10 year old daughter four night stay phinda mountain lodge

sentence.orig: We had also booked a couple of trips through &Beyond, the first of which was turtle watching that night.Spending Christmas Eve at Sodwana Bay, with the Milky Way and many other stars overhead, the waves crashing behind us, and watching a huge, beautiful leatherback turtle digging a nest to lay her eggs was absolutely magical.

sentence.orig: The room was phenomenal - we booked the family suite (rooms 24/26) which had two separate rooms each with a large double bed and a separate bedroom with two single beds and a communal lounge - this comfortably took our entire party of 8.This is one of the most memorable and wonderful trips I have ever taken.More impressive was the fact that my South African in-laws, who have been on many safaris, rated it as their best ever stay at a reserve.

sentence.orig: We stayed in a suite that was 5-star with an outdoor plunge pool and shower, a huge bathroom with freestanding tub and two level sleeping/living area.Amenities aside, what makes Phinda unique is that staff who clearly care about what they do, as well as strong belief in practicing the wildlife.Did we see the 'Big 5'?

sentence.nounPhrases: ['phinda', 'sa wild life tourism proud # animalsrule.on arrival', 'personal valet service', 'zululand heat', 'iced drink', 'private ranger wessel', 'meeting special health need', 'short notice', 'boer maak']
sentence.orig: Phinda does SA wild life tourism proud #animalsrule.On arrival, from our car being whisked away by a personal valet service to fresh wet towels in the Zululand heat an iced drink and luggage arriving at our room promptly, we felt like long awaited guests and the staff were always willing to meet a requestSpecial kudos to our private ranger Wessel for meeting a special health need on game drives at very short notice, as he said 'here a boer maak a plan' .

sentence.nounPhrases: ['what great experience', 'safari', 'spectacular location', 'main lodge', 'wonderful.our ranger jg', 'spotter betheuil <sp?>', 'top notch', 'lioness', 'boma dinner spectacular', 'bush meal', 'impressive operation', ':-) main lodge', 'family friendly lodge', 'fair chance', 'game drives....all', 'much choice']
sentence.orig: Well done to AndBeyond, they have again surpassed our expectations of what a great experience a Safari should be.Mountains lodge is in a spectacular location with stunning views from both the main lodge and from the apartments, and the game drives were truly wonderful.Our Ranger JG and spotter Betheuil <sp?> were absolutely top notch and some of the sightings were remarkable, include one particularly memorable one of a Lioness carry a cub in her mouth!Food is excellent and plentiful, the Boma dinner spectacular and the Bush meal a very impressive operation, as always we've come back with pounds to shed :-)The main lodge and the rooms are well appointed, the beds extremely comfortable, but as has been said elsewhere, if you're not particularly fit, the walk to the rooms might be a bit of a challenge.Also, worth noting is this is a family friendly lodge, so there's a fair chance you'll get a kid or two on your game drives....All in all, if there wasn't so much choice of where else to go, we'd go back in a heartbeat.

review.sentence: well do andbeyond surpass expectation great experience safari be.mountains lodge spectacular location stunning view main lodge apartment game drive truly wonderful.our ranger jg spotter betheuil < sp > absolutely top notch sighting remarkable include one particularly memorable one lioness carry cub mouth food excellent plentiful boma dinner spectacular bush meal impressive operation always 've come back pound shed main lodge room well appoint bed extremely comfortable say elsewhere 're particularly fit walk room might bit challenge.also worth noting family friendly lodge 's fair chance 'll get kid two game drive .all n't much choice else go 'd go back heartbeat

sentence.orig: We saw lion hunting buffalo and cheetah hunting impala (the first a dramatic fail, the latter a heart stopping success), rhino-both black and white - and a myriad of other amazing wildlife big and small from elephants to dung beetles - even the elusive suni antelope made an appearance.

sentence.orig: Experienced, knowledgeable game rangers and trackers that really go the extra mile to immerse you in the African wildlife experience (special thanks to Sibu and Tom, who hosted us over 3 days and managed to track down very nearly all of the major animal species - leopard being a notable exception, though not due to lack of effort or expertise on their part).The Mountain lodge has genuine luxurious units (the private plunge pools were very welcome on hot days).

sentence.nounPhrases: ['perfection.we', 'early september', 'late afternoon-evening game drive', 'dawn game drive', 'four game drives.the game drives', 'ourselves.our tracker busani', 'ranger dylon', 'great team', 'cheetah', 'lions', 'elephant', 'black', 'white rhino', 'giraffe']
sentence.orig: Perfection.We visited in early September for a two night stay which included a late afternoon-evening game drive on day of arrival and dawn game drive followed by breakfast on day of departure for a total of four game drives.The game drives were superb and for for the most part consisted of only our vehicle with tracker, ranger and six guests including ourselves.Our tracker Busani with our ranger Dylon made a great team, with their knowledge, experience and passion for the environment and animals which they were more than happy to share with us.Highlights from the game drives for me were seeing Cheetah, Lions, Elephant, Black & White Rhino, Giraffe...

sentence.orig: The last morning we were thrilled that in the middle of one of the morning drives we suddenly found ourselves stopping in a beautiful spot to enjoy champagne and croissants that had been left out ready for us - its these little touches that make Phina very special.Kenny the lodge manager was really good - he greeted us and made us feel very welcome and always took the time to talk to us and ask about our day - he never made you feel that he was just doing it to be polite - which was lovely.The rest of the staff were always very courteousThe lodge itself was excellent with lovely food and accommodation - definitely worth a visit - we would love to return but for longer another time.

sentence.orig: Great stay.We stayed 3 nights at Mountain Lodge, the lodge is beautiful and the rooms are great, they have a small outdoor plunge pool to cool off and great views over the bush, all the meals were excellent and we also had a surprise dinner in the bush that was excellent.The game drives were very good and we saw a good variety of Wildlife as well as a close up encounter with a pride of lions,our favourite sighting was watching 3 small warthog piglets and their mom, too cute.Phinda is a great reserve and good for Wildlife viewing and photography.

sentence.orig: Awesome Experience.Stayed 2 nights which was enough for us as we saw all the Big 5 during the 4 drives we took.The lodges are scattered along the hillside and have private plunge pools which were perfect for a dip in the hot summer sun.Staff were well trained .Food was really good .Security great.On our first night we were treated to a dinner in the bush.
